amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 118-37 to clarify that the term "athletic programs and activities" includes any activities a recipient chooses to restrict only to members of a team.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Ogles.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
